name: ideate.xyz
long_description:
ideate.xyz is the first AI graphics design co-pilot for content marketers.

It is a graphics editor as easy to use as Canva with a built-in AI designer, helping users to create and iterate brand consistent designs via chat or in editor.

Graphics design is still the biggest pain and most outsourced task for content marketers. This represents an $8 billion dollar market. ideate.xyz is the first copilot ot enable content marketers to truly own the design process.
one_liner: AI graphics design co-pilot for content marketers
